FuncDef: Use the display brief interface command to display the brief configuration information about one or all interfaces, including: interface type, link state, link rate, duplex attribute, link type, default VLAN ID and description string. This command is similar to the display interface command, but the information it displays is briefer. Related command: display interface .
CLIs: display brief interface [ <interface-type> <interface-number> ] [ { begin | include | exclude } <string> ]

ParaDef.Info: Specifies to use a regular expression to describe the configuration information entries to be displayed.
Each entry must begin with a specified character string.
Each entry must include a specified character string.
Each entry must not include a specified character string.
Regular expression, a character string of 1 to 256 characters.

Examples: Eth - Ethernet GE - GigabitEthernet TENGE - tenGigabitEthernet
Loop - LoopBack Vlan - Vlan-interface Cas - Cascade
Interface Link Speed Duplex Type PVID Description
Eth1/0/1 DOWN A A hybrid 1 home
ori_path: data/cmdcorpus/h3c/h3c_s3600/cmd_corpus/09-port basic configuration command/1.1.4 display brief interface_0.json
